subTitle: Ask us anything about our brand and products, and get factual responses.

faqs.question: How do I Get Started?
faqs.answer: Simply sign up using your email address and create a pool. Afterwards you and your friends can add one another to pools start pooling.

faqs.question: Who Can Initiate a Withdrawal?
faqs.answer: Any pool member can initiate a withdrawal. However, withdrawals require approval from randomly selected members by the system. This ensures transparency and legitimacy.

faqs.question: Do I need an M-Pesa Phone Number To Use GrupChat?
faqs.answer: Yes, Grupchat is designed to work with M-Pesa. You will need an M-Pesa phone number to sign up and use GrupChat.

faqs.question: How Much?
faqs.answer: GrupChat charges a maximum of 2% fee on withdrawals that lessens the bigger your plans. This ensures we continue to provide a seamless and rewarding experience for our users.

faqs.question: Does GrupChat have a limit to how many members a pool can have?
faqs.answer: No, GrupChat currently doesn't limit the number of pool members. However, we recommend keeping the number minimal and to persons you are a familiar with, since withdrawals involve approval requests.
